code: var COLORS={purple:'#d19fe9',green:'#7cd9c2',yellow:'#f7d16f'};function getBrandColor(){var code=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'000';var firstCode=code.charAt(0);switch(firstCode){case 3:case 9:return COLORS.green;case 5:return COLORS.yellow;case 1:case 7:case 8:default:return COLORS.purple;}}export default getBrandColor;
